meanings.sent1: The misjoinders pieces of the puzzle didn't fit together properly.
meanings.sent2: The misjoinders wires caused the machine to malfunction.
meanings.sent3: The misjoinders shoelaces made the shoes look like they were dancing.

meanings.definition: Misjoinders: Errors in the joining of legal parties in a lawsuit
meanings.sent1: The lawyer pointed out the misjoinders in the legal documents.
meanings.sent2: The judge dismissed the case due to misjoinders in the lawsuit.
meanings.sent3: The misjoinders in the courtroom paperwork caused confusion among the attorneys.
meanings.sent4: The misjoinders in the legal proceedings delayed the trial.
meanings.sent5: The misjoinders in the lawsuit paperwork were a headache for everyone involved.
